messages.content: The Liberal Democrats stand for building a fairer society. The Liberal Democrats have set out four steps to a fairer Britain.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Under our plans, you will pay no tax on the first 10,000 pounds you earn.
Cutting class sizes and abolishing tuition fees.
Making Britain greener through investment in public transport, renewable energy and more energy efficient homes.
A fairer voting system, more accountable politicians and no more corrupt MPs.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election here will be very close between myself and the Labour candidate. The Conservatives are in third place in this seat and can't win here.

issues.education: Cutting class sizes and abolishing tuition fees.
issues.environment: Making Britain greener through investment in public transport, renewable energy and more energy efficient homes.
issues.governance: A fairer voting system, more accountable politicians and no more corrupt MPs.

contactInformation.address: Unit 6, Hermes House, 59 Josephine Avenue, London SW2 2JZ

images.caption: Leaflet image with Chris Nicholson's photo and Liberal Democrat campaign information.
